channel.title: What do you think of the swamp water/grass and mycellium?
channel.description: What do you think of the swamp water/grass and mycellium? Do you think it looks ugly, do you think he should make the textures blend together more? Personally I don't MIND it but I would really like it if he were to smooth it together.

item.title: What do you think of the swamp water/grass and mycellium?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Davidi2:

I agree, it needs some sort of blending. And swamp water generation needs to be redone, an entire body of water should be swamp, not cut in half or whatever.

Or at least use a system like the smooth lighting but adapt it for smooth water?

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of the swamp water/grass and mycellium?
